metadata.title: CVE-2020-25658 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that python-rsa is vulnerable to Bleichenbacher timingattacks. An attacker can use this flaw via the RSA decryption API todecrypt parts of the cipher text encrypted with RSA.

criterions.comment: python-rsa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
